item.title: Video Creation for 61st Birthday Display - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented video creator to produce a memorable video for a 61st birthday display. The video should be creative, engaging, and capture the essence of the celebrant's life. It should include a combination of photos, videos, and music to create a heartwarming experience. The duration of the video should be around 5 minutes. We have specific photos and videos that we would like to include, but we also welcome your creative input to make the video even more special.

    Skills required:
    - Video editing
    - Photo editing
    - Music selection
    - Creative storytelling

    The final video should be delivered in a high-quality format suitable for display on a TV screen or projector.

    We are looking for an intermediate level video creator who has experience in creating memorable and emotional videos. Attention to detail and the ability to work within a given timeframe are highly important.

    If you are passionate about creating beautiful videos and have the skills to bring this project to life, we would love to hear from you.

    Please provide samples of your previous video projects along with your proposal.

    Note: We will provide the photos, videos, and music to be included in the video.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 23:07 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Photo Slideshow, Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing
Skills: Photo Slideshow, Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Edit a video of 4 minutes for marketing. - Upwork
item.description:
Our engineering company needs to edit a short 4-minutes video to promote an industrial robot for the food sector. The video is a recording inside a warehouse, the video should include:

1) Intro with our brand.
2) Subtitles of the voice (English).
3) Headline showing name of the manager.
4) Showing some elements during the video overlap like weight of the box, name of the robot arm, maximum capacity, and 3 key features.
5) Conclusion transition showing our company's logo.


Posted On: June 20, 2024 23:12 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial, Explainer Video
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial, Explainer Video
Country: Poland

item.title: You Tube Editor Needed - Upwork
item.description:
Hi! I’m looking for a video editor for my YouTube Channel. I make simple talking head videos and my channel is growing. However due to time constraints I don’t have time for in depth edits and effects. I simply color correct and adjust sound and upload. I’m looking for someone who can add some creative spice to my videos.

The video format is 4K 29 FPS and I don’t need anyone to edit or alter what I'm saying, the talking head and dialogue can remain as it is recorded. Just cut in B-Roll, transitions and cool effects. Don’t need subtitles but occasional key words on the screen with text animations here and there where appropriate and supportive of what I am saying will be nice. I’ll include a few examples of edit styles I’m interested in but we can develop our own style as well.

For this first video I want to see what you can come up with on 10 hrs of editing. This is a longer video so you certainly don’t have to fill the video with fast cuts and B Roll, just add and adjust where it is supportive of the dialogue. My audience likes slower, more mellow videos, like a guided meditation sort of vibe rather than fast cuts etc.

If the style and edit you come up with fits my channel well, I will send more your way.

Let me know if you are interested.

https://youtu.be/gw7zpKQK7HY?si=aEl_17BpkM9Z-jTl

https://youtu.be/uUZJea1UnS8?si=fH1OBIYyDlLRwfW1

https://youtu.be/MOcIUTEB6h0?si=zt6a7-6cuQ3a7hzk

Looking forward to hearing from you!

Angelo




Posted On: June 20, 2024 22:47 UTC
Category: Audio Editing
Skills:DaVinci Resolve, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, TikTok, Video Design, Video Editing, Final Cut Pro, Animation, Instagram Story, Color Grading, Podcast, Canva, Apple Motion
Skills: DaVinci Resolve, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, TikTok, Video Design, Video Editing, Final Cut Pro, Animation, Instagram Story, Color Grading, Podcast, Canva, Apple Motion
Country: United States

item.title: Creative Virtual Assistant (Canva Pro) for Design Projects - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking for a talented and self-motivated virtual assistant to collaborate on various real estate design projects. As a real estate professional, I work with clients and I need social media design and editing support to manage the workload.  The selected VA will sign a Work For Hire Contract Agreement/NDA: Non-Disclosure Agreement to ensure confidentiality. This is a trial run lasting 6 weeks or 6 milestones with the chance for bonuses for excellent performance and extending the work depending on the outcome.
--
Responsibilities & Expected Weekly Deliverables for Each Milestone:

DefaultTask#1: Video/Reels Creation:
1) Produce five (5) short real estate reels per week using media content sent to you or stock videos if there is none provided.
The first 2 are due Tuesdays EST, the rest are due Thursdays EST.
Reels must be editable in Canva or Capcut (with the ability to import into Canva for further customization).
No templates on reels—have fun and unleash your creativity!

2)DefaultTask#2: Research + Carousel Design:
Research and create engaging 1 carousel post (or fun reels) for weekend events.
Deliver these posts every Wednesday EST.
More inspirations/examples will be provided.

3) #1 High-Priority Weekly Deliverables for Agents -capped at 6:
Based on my needs, please design:
Listed Post: Provide a Canva link to: ONE main graphic, ONE instagram landscape cover, and ONE reel.
Open House Post: Share a Canva link for ONE main graphic and ONE reel.
Just Sold Post: Transform provided content into a Carousel post (I’ll guide you through this).
*and as-needed Print Designs (extra task paid through bonuses)

Flexibility: The specific tasks may vary weekly. For example:
1 Listed, 1 Open House, and 1 Just Sold
2 Listed, 2 Open House, 0 Sold
2 Listed, 1 Open House, 3 Sold
*The exact combination depends on the week’s requirements, but it will be capped at 6 agent posts.
--
Timeliness: Deliverables are due within 24 hours or less since they will be reviewed promptly.
--
Proposed Workflow:
Information about each task will be posted via Freedcamp and you'll be notified.
You’ll verify and gather details from listings on Zillow (or the other sites mentioned)
Edit designs in Canva / Video Editor
Send the Canva Collaboration Link via Freedcamp for review & feedback within 24 hours, and Please make me an Editor so I can comment on your design and we can collaborate more efficiently.
Then make any revisions, if needed.
Once approved, I'll add a comment saying - "This Task is done ✅" Then please change the status in your task manager to "Finalized and DONE"


Requirements:
Proficiency in Canva (must have Canva Pro version).
Ability to create captivating reels and graphics.
Fast learner—we’ll collaborate Freedcamp for effective communication and project management.
Open to learning new tools as the need arises.
Must know how to design engaging reels and have an eye for design.
Be okay with receiving a link to download photos and Have to Select the best photos to use for the content (I will guide you)


Payment and Milestones:
Weekly milestones at $38/week.
Performance-based bonuses for exceptional work.

Why This Project Is Exciting:
Clear expectations and deliverables.
Some templates are provided for branding consistency.
No need to write captions, just design graphics and reels.
Support and guidance are provided. I give chances to those who are proactive and show that they are motivated to learn and grow their design and editing skills. Feedback for your work will be given until you can work independently.
To see if you pay attention to details, please write "Maple Mayo" on the first line of your application.
Access to Project Management Tools: I will provide access to Freedcamp for our communication, collaboration, and project management. Everything will be organized—from milestones and discussions to a calendar and task management.
*I appreciate asynchronous work as long as I am continuously updated and high-priority tasks are completed in a timely manner, then we can get our work done and milestone payments can be released weekly.
Must be okay with zoom meetings 2x a month for effective collaboration.
Interested and willing to pitch in ideas & help take action for growing socials.

I will guide you on the 1st to 3rd milestone and ease into these additional tasks.
By the start of the 4th milestone, the selected candidate will start performing these:
-Pick out 10-15 best images but this time, Separate them in a folder called “Use these” and share with me
(We will collaborate through a shared drive (more info later)
-Finding trending audio to use with the reel from time to time (or at least 1 audio for 1 reel per week) would be a plus
-Change up the reel designs, Use capcut templates, experiment on reels for real estate/ local city info

Anyone who is starting something new will find it challenging in the first few days or first few weeks. I understand that. That is why communication is important. Message me or leave a video reply - multiple nudges may be needed for my neurodivergent brain, but that is why this job post is so detailed and you'll get a client who cares.

To apply:
Please provide some sample work of your reels and carousel post.

Thank you for your time!

Budget: $155
Posted On: June 20, 2024 22:27 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Color Theory, Social Media Imagery, Print Design, Brand Identity & Guidelines, Custom Graphics, Real Estate, CapCut, Canva, Graphic Design, Instagram, Facebook, Instagram Reels, Short Video, Video Ad, Social Media Carousel, Freelance Marketing
Skills: Color Theory, Social Media Imagery, Print Design, Brand Identity & Guidelines, Custom Graphics, Real Estate, CapCut, Canva, Graphic Design, Instagram, Facebook, Instagram Reels, Short Video, Video Ad, Social Media Carousel, Freelance Marketing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Crowdfunding Product Commercial - Upwork
item.description:
I am seeking a talented production person or team to create engaging advertisement videos for my product, the Softflex, featured at Alphatechapparel.com and on our kickstarter page https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/softflex/the-softflex-20-the-worlds-best-snow-hoodie.
These videos should be 45 seconds to 1:30 minutes long, designed for FB, IG, and TikTok paid ads.

The Softflex is a hybrid between a hoodie and a jacket, tailored for skiers, snowboarders, hikers, hunters, cold weather workers and outdoor enthusiasts. The ads need to be both informative and entertaining, highlighting the Softflex’s unique features and its appeal to our outdoorsy, mountain-dwelling customers. The content should resonate with active individuals who appreciate the style and functionality of our snow hoodie.

Requirements:
-Experience in producing high-quality video ads
-Ability to create informative yet fun and engaging content
-Understanding of outdoor and snow sports culture
-Proficiency in video editing software
-Access to a variety of clips that can relate to outdoor activities
-Understanding of social media ad strategies, including effective hooks and scroll-stopping techniques
To Apply:
-Please provide examples of your previous work, especially any relevant to outdoor or active lifestyle brands.


Posted On: June 20, 2024 22:19 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Commercial, Marketing Strategy, Crowdfunding, Content Writing, Video Production, Explainer Video
Skills: Video Commercial, Marketing Strategy, Crowdfunding, Content Writing, Video Production, Explainer Video
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Social Media VA | Video Ads/ UGC | Build Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Hello!

I'm looking for a social media expert. People with over 3 years of experience specializing in managing social media platforms such as: Facebook, Tiktok and Instagram...etc. I want to build and develop a brand for my products on social networking platforms. In addition, there is a virtual assistant. I require experience in editing video ads and UGC videos. Besides, you have experience building social media channels from scratch. Prove it by showing your case study.

Best regards,

item.description:
Hi, we're hiring a video editor for our Minecraft meme channel. Your task: produce one video per day

Responsibilities:

Edit one video daily for our channel.
Ensure timely uploads.

Requirements:

Basic video editing skills.
Attention to detail.
Send the video's on time.

Payment:

Monthly payment: $175.
(The videos will take like 30 minutes to make
see the attached file for an example. Most videos will be 50-60 seconds depending on the length of the audio. this is just a small part of the whole video.)

Additional Info:

- The video's have to be 4k quality
- We'll provide audio and gameplay footage.
- Send samples of your previous work if interested.
Excited to potentially work together!
